title: Israelis told to 'stop embracing', elderly urged to get booster as Covid-19 cases spike
content:
1. Israelis told to 'stop embracing', elderly urged to get booster as Covid-19 cases spike  CNN
  2. Israel vaccinated fast and looked like it had beaten COVID-19. It just brought back a swathe of restrictions amid a Delta surge.  Yahoo! Voices
  3. Bennett: Lockdown over the High Holidays depends on vaccination levels  The Times of Israel
  4. Israel Reimposes Covid Restrictions In Hopes of Avoiding a Lockdown  The New York Times
  5. PM: High Holiday lockdown depends on vaccination rate  Ynetnews
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: イスラエル人は「抱擁をやめるように」と言われ、高齢者はCovid-19の感染者が急増しているため、ブースターを受けるように促される。
以色列人被告知要 "停止拥抱"，由于Covid-19病例激增，老人被敦促接受强化治疗
以色列人被告知要 "停止擁抱"，由於Covid-19病例激增，老人被敦促接受強化治療
